bioghist.head: Biography/History
bioghist.p: Stephanie Clayton is a photographer and illustrator from Old Lyme, Connecticut. She has illustrated many children's books, to include Joyce Blackburn's Suki and the Invisible Peacock, Suki and the Red Umbrella, Suki and the Magic Sand Dollar, and Suki and the Wonder Star. Her photography is primarily focused on wildlife.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains assorted realia related to, and depicting, the Little Red Riding Hood Fairy Tale. The collection contains stuffed animals, dolls, porcelain figures, and a clock. Materials include several small plastic Little Red Riding Hood figurines, a Wolf figurine in bed, a stuffed Little Red Riding Hood rabbit, a 12" fabric Little Red Riding Hood puppet, and a Clock with an image of Little Red Riding Hood in center.
